mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice_basic B, ATTACH A WHERE B.ATCH_FILE_ID = A.ATCH_FILE_ID (+) AND NOTICE_CD = #{noticeCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_BASIC ( NOTICE_CD, NOTICE_TTL, NOTICE_REG, NOTICE_CON ) VALUES ( NOTICEBASIC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTtl}, SYSDATE, #{noticeCon} )

INSERT INTO NOTICE_BASIC ( NOTICE_CD, NOTICE_TTL, NOTICE_REG, NOTICE_CON, ATCH_FILE_ID ) VALUES ( NOTICEBASIC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTtl}, SYSDATE, #{noticeCon}, (SELECT MAX(ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM ATTACH) )
